revision.text: Possibly: Travels through different cities of Germany, Italy, Greece and several parts of Asia, as far as the banks of the Euphrates: in a series of letters. Containing, an account of what is most remarkable in their present state, as well as in their monuments of antiquity / by Alexander Drummond, Esq; His Majesty's consul at Aleppo. (London : Printed by W. Strahan for the author, MDCCLIV [1754]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1942245~S1
